title: Twisted Video Surfaces Of The Biden Family (Ep 1799)
description:
In this episode, I address the disgusting new video evidence of the Biden family corruption. And I ask the critical question few in the media are addressing. 

News Picks:

Joe Biden unwittingly helped finance Hunter Biden's trysts with Russia-linked escorts.

State Attorney General Suggests Considering Applicants' Ideological Viewpoints in Denying Carry Licenses.


46 bodies found in truck carrying migrants in San Antonio.

California working on denying gun permits based on "ideological viewpoints.” 


LA Times columnist asks if California is 'ready' for more legal black gun owners post-SCOTUS ruling.

One year after Biden touted saving Americans 16 cents, July 4th cookouts cost $10 more.


Clarence Thomas signals interest in revisiting media libel standard.
